item.title: kvm
item.author: serialt
item.description: KVM virt-install 安装虚拟机 virt-install 示例 virt-install \ --name=pc01 \ --graphics vnc,listen=0.0.0.0,port=5901,keymap=en_us \ --ram=1024 \ --vcpus=1 \ --disk path=/var/lib/libvirt/images/pc01.img,size=9,format=qcow2 \ --bridge=virbr0 \ --location=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.6 \ --extra-args="ks=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.4.ks" virt-install \ --name=pc02 \ --graphics vnc,listten=0.0.0.0,port=5920,keymap=en_us \ --noautoconsole \ --ram=1024 \ --vcpus=1 \ --disk path=/var/lib/libvirt/images/pc02.img,size=9,format=qcow2 \ --bridge=virbr0 \ --location=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.4 \ --extra-args="ks=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.4.ks" virt-install \ --name=pc03 \ --nographics \ --ram=1024 \ --vcpus=1 \ --disk path=/var/lib/libvirt/images/pc03.img,size=9,format=qcow2 \ --bridg=virbr0 --location=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.4 \ --extra-args="ks=ftp://172.16.8.100/rhel6.4.ks console=tty0 console=ttyS0" #
